basics.name: Arun Kumar T K
basics.label: JavaScript developer
summary: I'm a passionate JavaScript developer with 2+ years of experience in development and product management.
I've co-founded a web startup called 'HedCET' during my college days,which went on to make some cool products in the intellectual property domain.
I completed my graduation in Electronics and Communication Engineering from the esteemed College of Engineering, Trivandrum .

When I'm not coding I like Reading wikipedia articles; Recording songs; Disassembling & Assembling gadgets; Checking out new ROM releases and kernels for my Nexus devices; Watching Atletico Madrid matches; Listening System of a down songs; Reading Works of Kafka, Camus, Dostoevsky Nietzsche etc.; Adding new books to my calibre library; or Watching movies.

work.summary: Leading software development for the IP products initiative Clay-IP. My key responsibilites include leading the the front end development for all products, Product management and setting technological visions.
highlights: IP Dashboard : Designed and Developed UI & UX for the product. Developed using Meteor JS, Mongo DB, Polymer, Handsontable, FancyTree, nvD3 etc.
Proofreading Report Generation (PRG) : PRG is a proofreading workbench for paralegals. I led the development process. Developed using Meteor JS, Mongo DB, JQuery UI, Bootstrap, Rangy etc
IP-Analytics Tool : Next generation IP Analytics and Visualization tool. Developed using Meteor JS, NW JS, D3, MongoDB, Dexie JS Cheerio Highcharts, Polymer etc

Patent Data Accumulators : This tool Scrapes data from patent websites such as USPTO Public Pair, Espacenet, WIPO, Indian PTO etc. Developed using Meteor JS, Phantom JS, Casper JS, Cheerio, MongoDB etc
Other Products : Patent Term Adjustment (PTA) Calculator, Patent Family Tree Generator etc.

work.summary: I've co-founded HedCET technologies pvt ltd in 2011 during my graduation days. In 2013 HedCET signed an agreement with clairvolex.inc and have since develped many IP products assisting various stages of patent prosecution and litigation.
highlights: Developed a mail client called TinyMail
Developed Beehive an ERP software for the schools and colleges.

openSource.name: TinyMail
openSource.summary: This is an android application which serves to replace your email id with your mobile number,using which you can mail your contacts. In essence you don't need to know a persons mail id to mail him,mobile number would suffice. Our application replaces the native contacts application by adding the effective functionality described above

openSource.name: Torrenter
openSource.summary: Torrenter is a torrent alert & todo list app. Torrenter alerts the users if a new torrent file is added in his/her desired catagory/subscribed keyword.
